text: v1.02 - Update rolling out to the Chrome Extension - for details on what was updated: <https://github.com/williamspiro/HubSpot-Developer-Extension/releases>
Yay, the update appears to have just hit my browser. Hope everyone likes it
<@U7SL518D6> pinned a message to this channel.

Coworker wrote up a blog post about the extension :slightly_smiling_face:
<https://www.spingroup.com/work/2018/6/20/HubSpot-developer-extension-co-creation>

A reminder - if anyone is interested in contributing to the extension, it is an open source project on Github and we do have some good first issues people can tackle if interested to get their feet wet.
<https://github.com/williamspiro/HubSpot-Developer-Extension/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3A%22good+first+issue%22>
